means: 类人猿( troglodyte的名词复数 )

sentence.Network_en: He dismissed advocates of a completely free market as economic troglodytes with no concern for the social consequences.
sentence.Network_cn: 他认为那些鼓吹完全自由市场经济的人对经济只是一知半解，完全没有顾及到可能产生的社会后果。

PerfectNetExp.abs: troglodyte 老顽固, troglodytes 穴猿属, troglodyte 隐居人

list.abs: 科学家对尼日利亚西南部森林中大猩猩（Pan troglodytes）的分布状态进行了调查。确认该地区总计2443．58km 的15个森林保护区 …
...黑腰梅花雀（学名：Estrilda troglodytes），是梅花雀科梅花雀属的一种，分布于科特迪瓦、埃塞俄比亚、几内亚比绍、厄立特里亚、贝宁、塞内加尔、乍得、马里、波多黎各（引进种）、毛里塔尼亚、美国、喀麦隆、马提尼克（引进种）、尼.
...比如他称人为智人 ,Homo sapiens,有意识的人,但他也命名了另一个人种,Homo troglodytes,或,Homo nocturnus,山洞人或夜人,估计他用此来命名当时刚刚被发现的<a.
病毒体(Virosomes) 树鼩科(Tupaiidae) 黑猩猩属(Pan troglodytes) 宿主特异性(Host Specificity) 瑞士(Switzerland) 分类号  R512.62

entry.def: A troglodyte is someone who lives in a cave.

entry.tran: 井底之蛙;见识短浅的人
entry.def: If you refer to someone as a troglodyte, you mean that they are unsophisticated and do not know very much about anything.

example.ex: He dismissed advocates of a completely free market as economic troglodytes with no concern for the social consequences.
example.tran: 他认为那些鼓吹完全自由市场经济的人对经济只是一知半解，完全没有顾及到可能产生的社会后果。

auth_sentence.content: The troglodytes can no longer prevent a writer of such talents from reaching a large audience.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: The troglodytes can no longer prevent a writer of such talents from reaching a large audience.

auth_sentence.content: We all know the shameful fact that there are those modern male troglodytes who do just that & little more.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: We all know the shameful fact that there are those modern male troglodytes who do just that & little more.

auth_sentence.content: Light is reduced to shafts between concrete skyscrapers and the poor are troglodytes in the dark below.
